humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is no evidence of metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes (N0(sn-)) or in the regional lymph nodes (8 right axillary lymph nodes negative for tumor). This information aligns with New Rule 10 and New Rule 11, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that multiple (8) right axillary lymph nodes are negative for tumor and multiple (7) right axillary sentinel lymph nodes are also negative for tumor (AJCC pNo(sn-)). The patient has no positive lymph nodes, so the N stage is N0.
